类 ViewPagerPopup

  • java.lang.Object
    • PopupWindow
      • cn.bidaround.youtui_template.YTBasePopupWindow
        • cn.bidaround.youtui_template.ViewPagerPopup
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    android.support.v4.view.ViewPager.OnPageChangeListener

    public class ViewPagerPopup
extends YTBasePopupWindow
implements android.support.v4.view.ViewPager.OnPageChangeListener
    viewpager+gridview 黑色网格样式分享样式
    从以下版本开始:
    14/4/25
    作者:
    youtui
